select bno_seq.nextval from dual
insert into board (bno, title, content, writer) values (#{bno}, #{title}, #{content}, #{writer})
mapper.update: update board set title = #{title}, content = #{content}, writer = #{writer}, updateDate = sysdate where bno = #{bno}
mapper.select: select bno, title, content, writer, regdate, updatedate from ( select /*+INDEX_DESC(board bno) */ rownum rn, bno, title, content, writer, regdate, updatedate from board where rownum <= 20) where rn > 10
